col.name: pubmedid
description: Identifier of the main publication in PubMed

col.name: gad-antibodies
description: Glutamic acid decarboxylase antibodies (for units see Bingley et al. Diabetes 52

col.name: oral_anti-diabetic_medication
description: Oral anti-diabetic medication (meth: metformin; sulph: sulphonylurea)

col.name: uniquely_matched_reads
description: Number of uniquely matched reads (two paired end reads that matched the same gene were counted as one read)

col.name: gene_number_for_11m_uniquely_matched_reads
description: Gene number for 11 M uniquely matched reads

col.name: repeat
description: Samples with the same repeat number were acquired from the same subject

col.name: stec_count
description: Colony counts of STEC from samples (low < 10^4; moderate 10^4 to 10^6; high > 10^6 colony-forming units/mL)

col.name: nonhuman
description: Percentage of sequenced reads that did not align against the humane refence genome and thus were used in futher analysis

col.name: stec_coverage
description: Average coverage of the chromosome of the STEC O104:H4 reference genome

col.name: stx_ratio
description: Ratio of reads mapping to the Shiga-toxin genes to the reads mapping to STEC chromosomal loci

col.name: typingdata
description: Whether information on the serotpye (H4) and the multilocus sequence type for the outbreak strain could be recovered from the sample sequences

col.name: c_difficile_frequency
description: Prediceted abundance of Clostridium difficile relative to other bacterial species detected in the sample in the MetaPhlAn analysis

col.name: dfmp
description: Known consumers of a defined fermented milk product (DFMP)

col.name: 16s_rrna
description: 16S rRNA analysis performed in the study

col.name: shotgun_metagenome
description: Shotgun metagenomic analysis performed in the study

col.name: site_symmetry
description: Syte and symmetry of sample acquisition

col.name: reported_as_failed_qc
description: Number of reads reported as failed QC

col.name: uniquely_align_to_human
description: Number of reads uniquely aligned to human

col.name: non_uniquely_align_to_human_with_0_2_mismatches
description: Number of reads non-uniquely aligned to human with 0-2 mismatches

col.name: reads_removed_because_of_read_pair_trimming_discrepancy
description: Number of reads removed because of read pair trimming discrepancy

col.name: too_short_after_quality_trimming(<50bp)
description: Number of reads too short after quality trimming (<50bp)

col.name: quality_control
description: Number of reads after quality control

col.name: ajcc_stage
description: AJCC stage of the tumor (na: no classification for healthy controls or adenomas)

col.name: localization
description: Localization of the tumor/adenoma (rc: right colon

col.name: fobt
description: Result of the fecal occult blood test (FOBT)

col.name: wif-1_gene_methylation_test
description: Result of the wif-1 gene methylation test

col.name: group
description: Sample group (control: healthy controls and patients with small adenomas
column8: na: patients with large adenoma not included)
